name: The Alpha Device
description: Beyond space, beyond reason... beyond humanity. Discover a gripping tale of a dystopian future narrated by David Hewlett, star of the Academy Award-winning The Shape Of Water.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 10 处理器: i5 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: nVidIA GeForce® GTX 770 or better. 存储空间: 需要 300 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 10 处理器: i7 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: nVidia GTX 1080ti or better 存储空间: 需要 300 MB 可用空间
